        <description>Change awa_reject_reason.reason from a string to a translated_field</description>
        <name>Update type of AWA reject reason field</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[(function () {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
	gr.addQuery('name', 'awa_reject_reason');
	gr.addQuery('element', 'reason');
	gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'string');
	gr.setWorkflow(false);
	gr.query();

	if (!gr.next()) {
		return;
	}

	gr.setValue('internal_type', 'translated_field');
	gr.update();
})();]]></script>
